title: Deadline extended for admissions at IIUI
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 1 (APP):The International Islamic University, Islamabad (IIUI) has announced an extension to the application deadline for its fall semester admissions till Monday, 12th August 2024.
According to the IIUI, the extension covers all MS and PhD programs, while BS programs in the Faculty of Computing and Information Technology, Faculty of Engineering and Technology, BS English, BS Psychology, LLB and BS International Relations are not included in the extended date. The applicants of the rest of the BS programs may apply for admission till Monday, 12th August 2024.
Prospective students can find details on the offered programs, eligibility criteria, and fee structure on the universityâ€™s website, cms.iiu.edu.pk. For queries, male applicants can contact on WhatsApp number +92-0319-5213192, while female applicants can contact on +92-0319-5213193.
